title: Is it normal that I put off finishing a TV show or a game I like for the fear of emptiness feeling after finishing it? And how do I stop myself from doing it? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do this with food and things like a favorite powder or toiletries. I won’t totally finish anything because then I’ll be out of it and not have anymore. I try to buy extra so I have back up and can finish something knowing I have another waiting. As far as tv shows go, maybe find another show that interests you so you can finish one and start the new one. I’d try the same thing with games. If you have a new one to look forward to, it’ll be easier to finish the one you’re on now. You can also go back and replay a game you like and watch reruns of the shows. Or record the shows so you can watch them again.
